attributes.action: Leave State Pension calculations as they are now.
attributes.additional_details: Because the UK State Pension is one of the lowest State Pensions when compared to those in Europe and as a percentage of final salary/wage.  Most people only have a State Pension on which to live and are finding it hard to manage on what they receive now - especially following the recent, big rise in Council Tax and the cost of petrol, food and utilities.
attributes.background: Continue to protect the triple-lock for State Pensions.
